result.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for managing quests, events, rewards, and related operations in a gaming application and web service.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing HTTP handlers by domain functionality related to quests and events.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/events.g.purpose: Defines event handling for ongoing and internal events in a web service.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/generics.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for managing sponsors and user quests in a web service.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/pools.go.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for managing quest pools in a gaming application.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/quest.go.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for managing quests in a gaming application.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/quest_ac.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for quest-related actions in a web service.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/reward.g.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for managing rewards and quests in a reward system.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/shop.go.purpose: Defines HTTP handlers for shop-related routes in a web application.

internal/domains/quest/handlers/user.go.purpose: Handles user-related operations for quests, rewards, and events in the application.
